original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord after Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had let him go from Ramah, when he took him bound in chains along with all the captives of Jerusalem and Judah who were being exiled to Babylon.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단이 예루살렘과 유다의 포로를 바벨론으로 옮기는 중에 예레미야도 잡혀 사슬로 결박되어 가다가 라마에서 풀려난 후에 말씀이 여호와께로부터 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord
after Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had let him go
when he took him bound in chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 쇠사슬에 묶어 데려갈 때

sentences.original_text: along with all the captives of Jerusalem and Judah
who were being exiled to Babylon
